scheme_name: Saraswati Vidya Yojana: Free Distribution of Bicycles
State: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
details: “Free Distribution of Bicycles'' under “Saraswati Vidya Yojana”, implemented by the Directorate of Education, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, aims to provide bicycles free of cost to all the girl students, studying in class VIII(8) in the Govt. & Govt. aided schools/ Institutes.
objective: The objective of the scheme is to retain the girl students at Secondary & Higher Secondary stage and thereby decreasing the Dropout of the girl students by providing Bicycles to the girl students of class VIII to commute to school.
benefits: Bicycles will be provided to all the girl students.
eligibility: The applicant should be a girl.
The applicant should be a student.
The applicant should be studying in class VIII(8) in Government and Government Aided School of the UT of Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu.
exclusions: The girl students once availed the benefit will not be provided with the same in any of the subsequent year.
application_process: The Head Master/ In-charge Head Master will provide the number of enrolment of Girls in Std. VIII in Government and Government Aided Schools to the District Education Office.
